linear.ipynb:
{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "from sklearn import datasets\n",
    "from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "class LinearRegression:\n",
    "    def __init__(self) -> None:\n",
    "        self.w = None\n",
    "        self.b = None\n",
    "\n",
    "    def grad_w(self, x, y):\n",
    "        return (self.lr(x) - y) * x\n",
    "\n",
    "    def grad_b(self, x, y):\n",
    "        return self.lr(x) - y\n",
    "\n",
    "    def mse(self, y_test, y_pred):\n",
    "        return np.mean((y_test - y_pred) ** 2)\n",
    "\n",
    "    def lr(self, x):\n",
    "        return np.dot(x, self.w.T) + self.b\n",
    "\n",
    "    def predict(self, X):\n",
    "        return np.array([self.lr(x) for x in X])\n",
    "\n",
    "    def fit(self, X, Y, lr=0.15, epochs=10):\n",
    "        self.w = np.random.randn(1, X.shape[1])\n",
    "        self.b = 0\n",
    "\n",
    "        loss = {}\n",
    "        for i in range(epochs):\n",
    "            dw = 0\n",
    "            db = 0\n",
    "            for x, y in zip(X, Y):\n",
    "                dw += self.grad_w(x, y)\n",
    "                db += self.grad_b(x, y)\n",
    "            self.w -= lr * dw\n",
    "            self.b -= lr * db\n",
    "            loss[i] = self.mse(y, self.lr(x))\n",
    "        plt.plot(loss.values())\n",
    "        plt.xlabel(\"Epochs\")\n",
    "        plt.ylabel(\"Mean Squared Error\")\n",
    "        plt.show()\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "x, y = datasets.make_regression(\n",
    "    n_samples=100, n_features=1, noise=20, random_state=12345\n",
    ")\n",
    "x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(\n",
    "    x, y, test_size=0.2, random_state=12345\n",
    ")\n",
    "\n",
    "lr = LinearRegression()\n",
    "lr.fit(x_train, y_train, lr=0.015, epochs=300)\n",
    "\n",
    "y_pred_line = lr.predict(x)\n",
    "m1 = plt.scatter(x_train, y_train)\n",
    "m2 = plt.scatter(x_test, y_test)\n",
    "plt.plot(x, y_pred_line, color=\"black\", linewidth=2, label=\"Prediction\")\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  }
 ],
 "metadata": {
  "language_info": {
   "name": "python"
  }
 },
 "nbformat": 4,
 "nbformat_minor": 2
}
softmax.ipynb:
{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import torch\n",
    "from torch import nn, optim\n",
    "from torch.nn import functional as F\n",
    "from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split\n",
    "from sklearn.datasets import make_blobs\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "class SoftmaxRegression(nn.Module):\n",
    "    def __init__(self):\n",
    "        super().__init__()\n",
    "        torch.manual_seed(0)\n",
    "        self.net = nn.Sequential(nn.Linear(2, 4), nn.Softmax(dim=1))\n",
    "\n",
    "    def forward(self, x):\n",
    "        return self.net(x)\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def accuracy(y_hat, y):\n",
    "    pred = torch.argmax(y_hat, dim=1)\n",
    "    return (pred == y).float().mean()\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def fit(fn, x_train, y_train, epochs=1000, learning_rate=1):\n",
    "    loss_arr = []\n",
    "    acc_arr = []\n",
    "    opt = optim.SGD(fn.parameters(), lr=learning_rate)\n",
    "    for epoch in range(epochs):\n",
    "        y_hat = fn(x_train)\n",
    "        loss = F.cross_entropy(y_hat, y_train)\n",
    "        loss_arr.append(loss.item())\n",
    "        acc_arr.append(accuracy(y_hat, y_train))\n",
    "\n",
    "        loss.backward()\n",
    "        opt.step()\n",
    "        opt.zero_grad()\n",
    "\n",
    "    plt.plot(loss_arr)\n",
    "    plt.plot(acc_arr)\n",
    "    plt.show()\n",
    "    print(\"Loss before training\", loss_arr[0])\n",
    "    print(\"Loss after training\", loss_arr[-1])\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "data, labels = make_blobs(n_samples=1000, centers=4, n_features=2, random_state=0)\n",
    "x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(\n",
    "    data, labels, stratify=labels, random_state=0\n",
    ")\n",
    "x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = map(\n",
    "    torch.tensor,\n",
    "    (\n",
    "        x_train,\n",
    "        x_test,\n",
    "        y_train,\n",
    "        y_test,\n",
    "    ),\n",
    ")\n",
    "x_train = x_train.float()\n",
    "y_train = y_train.long()\n",
    "fn = SoftmaxRegression()\n",
    "fit(fn, x_train, y_train)\n"
   ]
  }
 ],
 "metadata": {
  "language_info": {
   "name": "python"
  }
 },
 "nbformat": 4,
 "nbformat_minor": 2
}
mlpbin.ipynb:
{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import torch\n",
    "import torch.nn as nn\n",
    "import torch.optim as optim\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "from sklearn.datasets import make_classification\n",
    "from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split\n",
    "from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "class MLP(nn.Module):\n",
    "    def __init__(self, input_dim, hidden_dim, output_dim) -> None:\n",
    "        super(MLP, self).__init__()\n",
    "        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(input_dim, hidden_dim)\n",
    "        self.relu = nn.ReLU()\n",
    "        self.fc2 = nn.Linear(hidden_dim, output_dim)\n",
    "\n",
    "    def forward(self, x):\n",
    "        out = self.fc1(x)\n",
    "        out = self.relu(out)\n",
    "        out = self.fc2(out)\n",
    "        return out\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def train_MLP(\n",
    "    X_train,\n",
    "    Y_train,\n",
    "    X_test,\n",
    "    Y_test,\n",
    "    input_dim,\n",
    "    hidden_dim,\n",
    "    output_dim,\n",
    "    epochs=100,\n",
    "    learning_rate=0.01,\n",
    "):\n",
    "    model = MLP(input_dim, hidden_dim, output_dim)\n",
    "    criterion = nn.CrossEntropyLoss()\n",
    "    optimizer = optim.Adam(model.parameters(), lr=learning_rate)\n",
    "    train_losses = []\n",
    "    test_losses = []\n",
    "    train_acc = []\n",
    "    test_acc = []\n",
    "    for epoch in range(epochs):\n",
    "        model.train()\n",
    "        optimizer.zero_grad()\n",
    "        outputs = model(X_train)\n",
    "        loss = criterion(outputs, Y_train)\n",
    "        loss.backward()\n",
    "        optimizer.step()\n",
    "\n",
    "        model.eval()\n",
    "        train_loss = criterion(model(X_train), Y_train)\n",
    "        train_losses.append(train_loss.item())\n",
    "        test_loss = criterion(model(X_test), Y_test)\n",
    "        test_losses.append(test_loss.item())\n",
    "\n",
    "        _, predicted_train = torch.max(outputs, 1)\n",
    "        _, predicted_test = torch.max(model(X_test), 1)\n",
    "        train_acc.append(\n",
    "            accuracy_score(\n",
    "                Y_train.numpy(),\n",
    "                predicted_train.detach().numpy(),\n",
    "            )\n",
    "        )\n",
    "        test_acc.append(\n",
    "            accuracy_score(\n",
    "                Y_test.numpy(),\n",
    "                predicted_test.detach().numpy(),\n",
    "            )\n",
    "        )\n",
    "    plt.plot(train_losses, label=\"Train Loss\")\n",
    "    plt.plot(test_losses, label=\"Test Loss\")\n",
    "    plt.xlabel(\"Epochs\")\n",
    "    plt.ylabel(\"Loss\")\n",
    "    plt.legend()\n",
    "    plt.show()\n",
    "\n",
    "    plt.plot(train_acc, label=\"Train Accuracy\")\n",
    "    plt.plot(test_acc, label=\"Test Accuracy\")\n",
    "    plt.xlabel(\"Epochs\")\n",
    "    plt.ylabel(\"Loss\")\n",
    "    plt.legend()\n",
    "    plt.show()\n",
    "\n",
    "    return train_losses, test_losses, train_acc, test_acc\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "X, Y = make_classification(n_samples=1000, n_features=20, n_classes=2, random_state=123)\n",
    "X_train, X_test, Y_train, Y_test = train_test_split(\n",
    "    X, Y, test_size=0.2, random_state=123\n",
    ")\n",
    "\n",
    "X_train, X_test = torch.tensor(X_train, dtype=torch.float32), torch.tensor(\n",
    "    X_test, dtype=torch.float32\n",
    ")\n",
    "Y_train, Y_test = torch.tensor(Y_train, dtype=torch.long), torch.tensor(\n",
    "    Y_test, dtype=torch.long\n",
    ")\n",
    "\n",
    "input_dim = X_train.shape[1]\n",
    "hidden_dim = 128\n",
    "output_dim = 2\n",
    "train_MLP(X_train, Y_train, X_test, Y_test, input_dim, hidden_dim, output_dim)\n"
   ]
  }
 ],
 "metadata": {
  "language_info": {
   "name": "python"
  }
 },
 "nbformat": 4,
 "nbformat_minor": 2
}

   "source": [
    "import torch\n",
    "import torch.nn as nn\n",
    "import torch.optim as optim\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "from sklearn.datasets import make_classification\n",
    "from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split\n",
    "from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "class MLP(nn.Module):\n",
    "    def __init__(self, input_dim, hidden_dim, output_dim) -> None:\n",
    "        super(MLP, self).__init__()\n",
    "        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(input_dim, hidden_dim)\n",
    "        self.relu = nn.ReLU()\n",
    "        self.fc2 = nn.Linear(hidden_dim, output_dim)\n",
    "\n",
    "    def forward(self, x):\n",
    "        out = self.fc1(x)\n",
    "        out = self.relu(out)\n",
    "        out = self.fc2(out)\n",
    "        return out\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def train_MLP(\n",
    "    X_train,\n",
    "    Y_train,\n",
    "    X_test,\n",
    "    Y_test,\n",
    "    input_dim,\n",
    "    hidden_dim,\n",
    "    output_dim,\n",
    "    epochs=100,\n",
    "    learning_rate=0.01,\n",
    "):\n",
    "    model = MLP(input_dim, hidden_dim, output_dim)\n",
    "    criterion = nn.CrossEntropyLoss()\n",
    "    optimizer = optim.Adam(model.parameters(), lr=learning_rate)\n",
    "    train_losses = []\n",
    "    test_losses = []\n",
    "    train_acc = []\n",
    "    test_acc = []\n",
    "    for epoch in range(epochs):\n",
    "        model.train()\n",
    "        optimizer.zero_grad()\n",
    "        outputs = model(X_train)\n",
    "        loss = criterion(outputs, Y_train)\n",
    "        loss.backward()\n",
    "        optimizer.step()\n",
    "\n",
    "        model.eval()\n",
    "        train_loss = criterion(model(X_train), Y_train)\n",
    "        train_losses.append(train_loss.item())\n",
    "        test_loss = criterion(model(X_test), Y_test)\n",
    "        test_losses.append(test_loss.item())\n",
    "\n",
    "        _, predicted_train = torch.max(outputs, 1)\n",
    "        _, predicted_test = torch.max(model(X_test), 1)\n",
    "        train_acc.append(\n",
    "            accuracy_score(\n",
    "                Y_train.numpy(),\n",
    "                predicted_train.detach().numpy(),\n",
    "            )\n",
    "        )\n",
    "        test_acc.append(\n",
    "            accuracy_score(\n",
    "                Y_test.numpy(),\n",
    "                predicted_test.detach().numpy(),\n",
    "            )\n",
    "        )\n",
    "    plt.plot(train_losses, label=\"Train Loss\")\n",
    "    plt.plot(test_losses, label=\"Test Loss\")\n",
    "    plt.xlabel(\"Epochs\")\n",
    "    plt.ylabel(\"Loss\")\n",
    "    plt.legend()\n",
    "    plt.show()\n",
    "\n",
    "    plt.plot(train_acc, label=\"Train Accuracy\")\n",
    "    plt.plot(test_acc, label=\"Test Accuracy\")\n",
    "    plt.xlabel(\"Epochs\")\n",
    "    plt.ylabel(\"Loss\")\n",
    "    plt.legend()\n",
    "    plt.show()\n",
    "\n",
    "    return train_losses, test_losses, train_acc, test_acc\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "X, Y = make_classification(\n",
    "    n_samples=1000, n_features=20, n_classes=3, n_clusters_per_class=1, random_state=123\n",
    ")\n",
    "X_train, X_test, Y_train, Y_test = train_test_split(\n",
    "    X, Y, test_size=0.2, random_state=123\n",
    ")\n",
    "\n",
    "X_train, X_test = torch.tensor(X_train, dtype=torch.float32), torch.tensor(\n",
    "    X_test, dtype=torch.float32\n",
    ")\n",
    "Y_train, Y_test = torch.tensor(Y_train, dtype=torch.long), torch.tensor(\n",
    "    Y_test, dtype=torch.long\n",
    ")\n",
    "\n",
    "input_dim = X_train.shape[1]\n",
    "hidden_dim = 128\n",
    "output_dim = 3\n",
    "train_MLP(X_train, Y_train, X_test, Y_test, input_dim, hidden_dim, output_dim)\n"
   ]
  }
 ],

RNN,LSTM,GRU.ipynb:
{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import string\n",
    "import torch\n",
    "import torch.nn as nn\n",
    "import torch.optim as optim\n",
    "from IPython.display import clear_output"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "languages = []\n",
    "data = []\n",
    "X = []\n",
    "y = []\n",
    "\n",
    "with open(\"data/name2lang.txt\", \"r\") as f:\n",
    "    for line in f:\n",
    "        line = line.split(\",\")\n",
    "        name = line[0].strip()\n",
    "        lang = line[1].strip()\n",
    "        if not lang in languages:\n",
    "            languages.append(lang)\n",
    "        X.append(name)\n",
    "        y.append(lang)\n",
    "        data.append((name, lang))\n",
    "\n",
    "n_languages = len(languages)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "['Portuguese', 'Irish', 'Spanish', 'Vietnamese', 'Chinese', 'Greek', 'Czech', 'Dutch', 'Japanese', 'French', 'German', 'Scottish', 'English', 'Russian', 'Polish', 'Arabic', 'Korean', 'Italian']\n",
      "[('Abreu', 'Portuguese'), ('Albuquerque', 'Portuguese'), ('Almeida', 'Portuguese'), ('Alves', 'Portuguese'), ('Araujo', 'Portuguese')]\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "print(languages)\n",
    "print(data[0:5])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "16040 4010\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(\n",
    "    X, y, test_size=0.2, random_state=0, stratify=y\n",
    ")\n",
    "print(len(X_train), len(X_test))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "all_letters = string.ascii_letters + \" .,;'\"\n",
    "n_letters = len(all_letters)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def name_rep(name):\n",
    "    rep = torch.zeros(len(name), 1, n_letters)\n",
    "    for index, letter in enumerate(name):\n",
    "        pos = all_letters.find(letter)\n",
    "        rep[index][0][pos] = 1\n",
    "    return rep\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def lang_rep(lang):\n",
    "    return torch.tensor([languages.index(lang)], dtype=torch.long)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def infer(net, name):\n",
    "    net.eval()\n",
    "    name_ohe = name_rep(name)\n",
    "    hidden = net.init_hidden()\n",
    "    for i in range(name_ohe.size()[0]):\n",
    "        output, hidden = net(name_ohe[i], hidden)\n",
    "    return output\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def dataloader(npoints, X_, y_):\n",
    "    to_ret = []\n",
    "    for i in range(npoints):\n",
    "        index_ = np.random.randint(len(X_))\n",
    "        name, lang = X_[index_], y_[index_]\n",
    "        to_ret.append((name, lang, name_rep(name), lang_rep(lang)))\n",
    "    return to_ret\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def eval(net, n_points, k, X_, y_):\n",
    "    data_ = dataloader(n_points, X_, y_)\n",
    "    correct = 0\n",
    "    for name, language, name_ohe, lang_rep in data_:\n",
    "        output = infer(net, name)\n",
    "        val, indices = output.topk(k)\n",
    "        if lang_rep in indices:\n",
    "            correct += 1\n",
    "    accuracy = correct / n_points\n",
    "    return accuracy\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def train(net, opt, criterion, n_points):\n",
    "    opt.zero_grad()\n",
    "    total_loss = 0\n",
    "    data_ = dataloader(n_points, X_train, y_train)\n",
    "    for name, language, name_ohe, lang_rep in data_:\n",
    "        hidden = net.init_hidden()\n",
    "        for i in range(name_ohe.size()[0]):\n",
    "            output, hidden = net(name_ohe[i], hidden)\n",
    "        loss = criterion(output, lang_rep)\n",
    "        loss.backward(retain_graph=True)\n",
    "        total_loss += loss\n",
    "    opt.step()\n",
    "    return total_loss / n_points\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def train_setup(\n",
    "    net, lr=0.01, n_batches=100, batch_size=10, momentum=0.9, display_freq=5\n",
    "):\n",
    "    criterion = nn.NLLLoss()\n",
    "    opt = optim.SGD(net.parameters(), lr=lr, momentum=momentum)\n",
    "    loss_arr = np.zeros(n_batches + 1)\n",
    "    for i in range(n_batches):\n",
    "        loss_arr[i + 1] = (loss_arr[i] * i + train(net, opt, criterion, batch_size)) / (\n",
    "            i + 1\n",
    "        )\n",
    "        if i % display_freq == display_freq - 1:\n",
    "            clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "            print(\n",
    "                \"Iteration\",\n",
    "                i+1,\n",
    "                \"Top-1:\",\n",
    "                eval(net, len(X_test), 1, X_test, y_test),\n",
    "                \"Top-2:\",\n",
    "                eval(net, len(X_test), 2, X_test, y_test),\n",
    "                \"Loss\",\n",
    "                loss_arr[i],\n",
    "            )\n",
    "            plt.figure()\n",
    "            plt.plot(loss_arr[1:i], \"-*\")\n",
    "            plt.xlabel(\"Iteration\")\n",
    "            plt.ylabel(\"Loss\")\n",
    "            plt.show()\n",
    "            print(\"\\n\\n\")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "lr=0.0005\n",
    "n_batches=30\n",
    "batch_size=200"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# RNN\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 9,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "class RNN_net(nn.Module):\n",
    "    def __init__(self, input_size, hidden_size, output_size):\n",
    "        super(RNN_net, self).__init__()\n",
    "        self.hidden_size = hidden_size\n",
    "        self.i2h = nn.Linear(input_size + hidden_size, hidden_size)\n",
    "        self.i2o = nn.Linear(input_size + hidden_size, output_size)\n",
    "        self.softmax = nn.LogSoftmax(dim=1)\n",
    "\n",
    "    def forward(self, input_, hidden):\n",
    "        combined = torch.cat((input_, hidden), 1)\n",
    "        hidden = self.i2h(combined)\n",
    "        output = self.i2o(combined)\n",
    "        output = self.softmax(output)\n",
    "        return output, hidden\n",
    "\n",
    "    def init_hidden(self):\n",
    "        return torch.zeros(1, self.hidden_size)"
   ]
  },
  {

    "n_hidden = 128\n",
    "net = RNN_net(n_letters, n_hidden, n_languages)"
   ]

   ]

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# LSTM cell"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "class LSTM_net(nn.Module):\n",
    "    def __init__(self, input_size, hidden_size, output_size):\n",
    "        super(LSTM_net, self).__init__()\n",
    "        self.hidden_size = hidden_size\n",
    "        self.lstm_cell = nn.LSTM(input_size, hidden_size)\n",
    "        self.h2o = nn.Linear(hidden_size, output_size)\n",
    "        self.softmax = nn.LogSoftmax(dim=2)\n",
    "\n",
    "    def forward(self, input_, hidden):\n",
    "        out, hidden = self.lstm_cell(input_.view(1, 1, -1), hidden)\n",
    "        output = self.h2o(hidden[0])\n",
    "        output = self.softmax(output)\n",
    "        return output.view(1, -1), hidden\n",
    "\n",
    "    def init_hidden(self):\n",
    "        return (torch.zeros(1, 1, self.hidden_size), torch.zeros(1, 1, self.hidden_size))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 13,

    "n_hidden = 128\n",

    "train_setup(net, lr, n_batches, batch_size)"
   ]

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# GRU"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 14,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "class GRU_net(nn.Module):\n",
    "    def __init__(self, input_size, hidden_size, output_size):\n",
    "        super(GRU_net, self).__init__()\n",
    "        self.hidden_size = hidden_size\n",
    "        self.gru_cell = nn.GRU(input_size, hidden_size)\n",
    "        self.h2o = nn.Linear(hidden_size, output_size)\n",
    "        self.softmax = nn.LogSoftmax(dim=2)\n",
    "\n",
    "    def forward(self, input_, hidden):\n",
    "        out, hidden = self.gru_cell(input_.view(1, 1, -1), hidden)\n",
    "        output = self.h2o(hidden)\n",
    "        output = self.softmax(output)\n",
    "        return output.view(1, -1), hidden\n",
    "\n",
    "    def init_hidden(self):\n",
    "        return torch.zeros(1, 1, self.hidden_size)"
   ]
  },
